function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 misinformation causing fear and panic","Impact":"Increase in fear and panic, leading to non-compliance with health guidelines and exacerbating the spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns, fact-checking initiatives, and clear communication from health authorities","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, fact-checking algorithms, and information verification platforms","People":"General public, social media users, and communities at risk of misinformation","Owner":"Health authorities, social media platforms, fact-checking organizations"},{"Description":"Stigmatization and anxiety related to COVID-19","Impact":"High levels of stigma, discrimination, and mental health issues among COVID-19 patients and frontline workers","Mitigation":"Public awareness and education, destigmatization campaigns, and mental health support services","Technologies":"Online support groups, mental health apps, and community engagement platforms","People":"COVID-19 patients, healthcare workers, and communities at risk of stigmatization","Owner":"Health organizations, mental health professionals, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Generation of noisy data for COVID-19","Impact":"Inaccurate analysis, unreliable predictions, and flawed decision-making based on noisy data","Mitigation":"Data quality assurance processes, validation checks, and data cleaning algorithms","Technologies":"Data validation tools, machine learning algorithms for data cleaning, and statistical quality control methods","People":"Data analysts, researchers, and decision-makers using COVID-19 data","Owner":"Data management teams, research institutions, and public health authorities"}]}
